typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Year_Month as string
}
source(output(
		Matricule as string,
		Date_DebutContrat as string,
		Date_FinContrat as string,
		Nbre_HeuresWTh_Jour as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT  Matricule, Date_DebutContrat,Date_FinContrat,Nbre_HeuresWTh_Jour FROM dbo.STG_EXT_RefEmploye WHERE YEAR_MONTH = '{$Year_Month}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> SrcExtREFEmploye
source(output(
		Matricule as string,
		Date_Naissance as string,
		ID_Metier as integer,
		ID_Etablissement as integer,
		ID_TypeContrat as string,
		Salaire_Annuel_th as decimal(18,6)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT Matricule, Date_Naissance, ID_Metier, ID_Etablissement, ID_TypeContrat, Salaire_Annuel_th FROM dbo.STG_RefEmploye WHERE YEAR_MONTH ='{$Year_Month}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> SrcRefEmploye
source(output(
		ID_TypeContrat as integer,
		Code_Contrat as string,
		Lib_Contrat_FR as string,
		Ordre_Contrat as integer,
		Code_RegroupContrat as string,
		Lib_RegroupContrat_FR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcDTypeContrat
SrcExtREFEmploye, SrcRefEmploye join(SrcExtREFEmploye@Matricule == SrcRefEmploye@Matricule,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinRefEmplExtEmpl
JoinRefEmplExtEmpl, SrcDTypeContrat lookup(SrcRefEmploye@ID_TypeContrat == Code_Contrat,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupTypeContrat
DerivedColumn alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> SDC
LookupTypeContrat select(mapColumn(
		Matricule = {SrcExtREFEmploye@Matricule},
		Date_DebutContrat,
		Date_FinContrat,
		Nbre_HeuresWTh_Jour,
		Date_Naissance,
		ID_Metier,
		ID_Etablissement,
		Salaire_Annuel_th,
		ID_TypeContrat = {SrcDTypeContrat@ID_TypeContrat}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Select derive(Date_Naissance = toDate(substring(Date_Naissance,7,4) + '-' + substring(Date_Naissance,4,2) + '-' + substring(Date_Naissance,1,2)),
		Date_DebutContrat = toDate(substring(Date_DebutContrat,7,4) + '-' + substring(Date_DebutContrat,4,2) + '-' + substring(Date_DebutContrat,1,2)),
		Date_FinContrat = toDate(substring(Date_FinContrat,7,4) + '-' + substring(Date_FinContrat,4,2) + '-' + substring(Date_FinContrat,1,2)),
		Nbre_HeuresWTh_Jour = toInteger(Nbre_HeuresWTh_Jour)) ~> DerivedColumn
SDC sink(input(
		Matricule as string,
		Date_Naissance as date,
		ID_Metier as integer,
		ID_Etablissement as integer,
		ID_TypeContrat as integer,
		Date_DebutContrat as date,
		Date_FinContrat as date,
		Salaire_Annuel_th as decimal(18,6),
		Nbre_HeuresWTh_Jour as decimal(6,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Matricule'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Matricule,
		Date_Naissance,
		ID_Metier,
		ID_Etablissement,
		ID_TypeContrat,
		Date_DebutContrat,
		Date_FinContrat,
		Salaire_Annuel_th,
		Nbre_HeuresWTh_Jour
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkDimEmploye
